isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON 2000 SERIES™ (LCT) TRANSMISSION ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - DESCRIPTION - ANTILOCK BRAKE SYSTEM (ABS) INTERFACE

svcproc.title: ANTILOCK BRAKE SYSTEM (ABS) INTERFACE
svcproc.para: The TCM also has an input from the Antilock Brake System Electronic Control Module (ECM). When the antilock system senses a wheel lockup condition is about to occur, the Allison TCM will prevent the transmission lockup clutch from engaging. This will insure the transmission operates in the hydraulic mode, preventing it from affecting wheel slippage.
